title: 3 and Out  - Weekend Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out  - Weekend Mailbag
description:
Heading into NFL Week 8, John empties out the Middlekauff Mailbag and responds to your listener questions, including Daniel Jones' NFL future, Russ putting the Broncos into the media line of fire, and dark horse Super Bowl teams.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action! #Volume #Herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
